title: Self-Determination Theory-Based Undergraduate Capstone Course: Blended Learning and Community Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of advanced scientific theories and experimental methodologies, experience in basic research design
context.additional_context: Learners access the LMS via smartphones, with asynchronous discussions and resource sharing as primary activities

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously set science capstone project goals by applying Self-Determination Theory.
Learners strengthen collaborative competencies through online discussions and community inquiry in a blended learning environment.
Learners can measure professional growth and propose improvement strategies through ENHANCE model-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
